author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...GILMA'S BRIEF RAPID INTENSIFICATION RATE HAS LEVELED OFF...
summary:
...GILMA'S BRIEF RAPID INTENSIFICATION RATE HAS LEVELED OFF...
 As of 11:00 PM HST Sat Aug 24
 the center of Gilma was located near 18.0, -132.5
 with movement WNW at 9 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 949 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 130 mph.
